title: Persona 5 Official Design Works ARTBOOK
description:
DOWNLOADED FROM:


w w w . k b g c u b a . w o r d p r e s s . c o m




This website is where i keep my personal collection of Official Strategy Guides and Artbooks.

The treasured visuals and the first publicly stuffed contents! A set of artworks gathered with the charm of "P5"! - Main characters and their personas, including the main illustration of the people involved in "Kaitou" · In addition, the initial setting picture of the characters, the rough picture, the original draft etc., super valuable illustration too! - Bust-up illustrations seen in the game, as well as covering game visuals, such as cuts during battle in familiar fashion at the time of total attack and "Bitchi" · Illustrations drawn down for magazine covers and posters are re-recorded in the illustration gallery - Character commentary by Mr. Sochima who handled character design, In the long interview, the secret episode of the first public release in Japan is told! · The storyboard of the opening movie is also posted with details. Highlights · Personal data of the main characters who were not revealed until now are also known !? · Cover is delivered in Atlas Official Drawing Illustration! It is really a waste not to see this !! Contents (From "BOOK" database) Full of illustration of the people involved with the "Kaido Group", including the main character and its persona! Illustrations related to painting, along with the character designer Mr. Seiji Shimoji, character designer!
Identifier Persona5OfficialDesignWorksARTBOOK
